about_the_game:
Gardening is one of life’s simplest pleasures, and there are few things more satisfying than watching a plant grow from a tiny seedling to a blooming plant. Pocket Oasis brings that joy to life in a beautiful, hand-painted world.

Take a deep, relaxing breath and step out onto your very own balcony in a city of your choice. Choose from a wide variety of plants and decorations as you build your own little pocket oasis.

Game Features

  • Relax in a hand crafted 2.5D balcony simulation with casual gameplay to unwind
  • Decorate 3 balconies in stunning cities around the world with hand-painted watercolors
  • 36 plants to unlock each with their own fruit to grow, harvest, and turn into jam
  • Name and repot your plants with up to 36 unlockable pots
  • 36 bespoke decorations to give each balcony a personal touch
  • A day and night cycle that impacts plant stats
  • Real-life geographical, weather, and climate data backend

Plants

Design a garden that’s entirely your own - With a wide selection of fruit bushes, vegetables and herbs, you have complete control over what you choose to grow in your garden. Decorate your balcony as you see fit - this is your little oasis.

Harvest Fruit

Transform your balcony into a true masterpiece with vibrant colours and deliciously drawn fruit.

Pets

Unlock up to 20 of your very own pets to roam around on your balcony.

Cities

Discover gardens around the globe - Grow sunflowers in Switzerland, roses in Rome, or figs in France - explore cities across Europe.

Weather

Influenced by real-life weather - Pocket Oasis takes data from the real world and brings it into the game, mirroring the weather and seasons of each city with its real-life counterpart.

Hand Painted

Beautiful, hand-painted water colours - Every flower, creature, object and backdrop has been carefully painted by hand.

Audio

Original scoring from composer Tom Jensen.
